articles.author: Maggie Miller
articles.title: Senators fume over response to ‘disturbing and widespread’ Chinese hack of US telecoms - POLITICO
articles.description: “I think the American people need to know the extent of the breach here, I think they will be shocked at the extent of it,” said Sen. Josh Hawley of the breach.
articles.content:
Theres no accountability in anybody sitting up there, Sen. Rick Scott (R-Fla.) told reporters after the briefing. They have not told us why they didnt catch it, what theyve done to prevent it.
If so… [+4468 chars]

articles.author: Margherita Bassi
articles.title: Mammoth Meat Powered Ice Age Humans, Study Finds - Gizmodo
articles.description: Scientists have determined that the diet of a Clovis woman who lived in North America 13,000 years ago included a substantial portion of mammoth and other large game.
articles.content: Have you ever wondered what prehistoric humans ate 13,000 years ago? Researchers in the United States and Canada have presented evidence suggesting that some of the earliest inhabitants of North Amer… [+4878 chars]
